author: sky.cactus
content: Are there any solutions to contract owned anonymous transfers/transactions?

author: sky.cactus
content: Something where a contract wallet could have rights to something like a Tornado note, and whoever controls the contract can withdraw.

author: sky.cactus
content: As a user, one of the scariest parts of something like Tornado is that I cannot use something like Gnosis Social Recovery, Multisig, Recoverable Wallet, etc.  I have to secure all of my notes with no mechanism for recovery in the case of loss.

author: sky.cactus
content: Asking here because there didn't seem to be an obviously better channel and with account abstraction the hope is that everyone moves their funds to wallets with more enhanced security and recovery options.
